summary.raw:
Merged in cbillington/qtutils (pull request #14)

Compatibility with coloured output from subprocesses

Approved-by: Philip Starkey <philip.starkey@gmail.com>

summary.raw:
Comment out zprocess test code so that test can run without zprocess.
Add 'supports_rich_write' attribute to OutputBox so zprocess can look at this
rather than introspecting whether write() supports the relevant keyword argument.
summary.html:
Comment out zprocess test code so that test can run without zprocess.
Add 'supports_rich_write' attribute to OutputBox so zprocess can look at this
rather than introspecting whether write() supports the relevant keyword argument.

values.message:
Comment out zprocess test code so that test can run without zprocess.
Add 'supports_rich_write' attribute to OutputBox so zprocess can look at this
rather than introspecting whether write() supports the relevant keyword argument.

summary.raw:
Added charformat keyword argument to OutputBox.write(). This makes it compatible
with being the stream assigned to a zprocess.RichStreamHandler logging handler,
allowing colourised logging to an outputbox.

Added file-like stub methods to OutputBox so that it can be used in place of a
file-like object.

Add aliases for formatting based on log levels.

Fix failure to memoise text formatting.

Add font name as a varaible instead of using a string literal where it's used

Remove use of 'red' string favouring the RED variable instead.

Fixed bug which caused obscure error message due to font loading being attempted
after an exception in the main thread (`__file__` doesn't exist as seen from the
thread apparantly - now we save the fonts location in a global varaible earlier)

Added charformat keyword argument to OutputBox.write(). This makes it compatible
with being the stream assigned to a zprocess.RichStreamHandler logging handler,
allowing colourised logging to an outputbox.

Added file-like stub methods to OutputBox so that it can be used in place of a
file-like object.

Add aliases for formatting based on log levels.

Fix failure to memoise text formatting.

Add font name as a varaible instead of using a string literal where it's used

Remove use of 'red' string favouring the RED variable instead.

Fixed bug which caused obscure error message due to font loading being attempted
after an exception in the main thread (__file__ doesn't exist as seen from the
thread apparantly - now we save the fonts location in a global varaible earlier)

values.message:
Added charformat keyword argument to OutputBox.write(). This makes it compatible
with being the stream assigned to a zprocess.RichStreamHandler logging handler,
allowing colourised logging to an outputbox.

Added file-like stub methods to OutputBox so that it can be used in place of a
file-like object.

Add aliases for formatting based on log levels.

Fix failure to memoise text formatting.

Add font name as a varaible instead of using a string literal where it's used

Remove use of 'red' string favouring the RED variable instead.

Fixed bug which caused obscure error message due to font loading being attempted
after an exception in the main thread (`__file__` doesn't exist as seen from the
thread apparantly - now we save the fonts location in a global varaible earlier)
